p: Two previous trials of systemic corticosteroids to address the high cytokine load did not improve mortality and instead caused a delay in viral clearance ( Arabi et al., 2018, Stockman et al., 2006). That said, a new clinical trial of methylprednisolone has recently been approved to determine whether COVID-19 cases respond ( Harrison, 2020). Switching to short-term, moderate-dose regimens of corticosteroids, combined with immunoglobins, improves oxygenation ( Zhou et al., 2020).
